duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement the strategic medical plan for Canada.
Leverage medical insights from internal and external partners into the strategic and tactical plan to support optimization of marketed products.
Coordinate medical field activities and collaborate with ABM’s as it relates to account management across Canada.
Contribute to development and review of clinical documents for Canadian regulatory and payer submissions, as needed.

education_certification.credential: M.D., D.O., or equivalent degree with Canadian work experience in the area of neurology or psychiatry targeting 8 years of progressive experience in the biotech or pharmaceutical industry. Experience in an academic setting is preferred.
